title: Sunny 3BR/2BA+Balcony with W/D in unit in prime Clinton Hill! G,C,S
posting_body: ['Sunny Spacious 2BR/2BA with Balcony and W/D in Prime Clinton Hill!', 'This unit has a broker fee!', 'Available to move in!', 'Pet friendly!', 'Welcome to Classon Avenue , Gorgeous 2BR/2BA+ Balcony in prime Clinton Hill couple of blocks from Fort Greene Park & Herbert Von King Park!', 'Prime location Near great restaurants, retail stores, supermarkets, parks just within a few minutes walk!', 'Easy commute to the City and around Brooklyn with the G and C,S trains!', 'Apartment Features:', '✪ Balcony', '✪ High ceiling', '✪Plenty of storage space around the unit.', '✪Oversized windows throughout( Plenty of natural light)', '✪ Open concept Kitchen and stainless steel appliances+D/W', '✪2 Queen/King Bedroom+ Closet space', '✪ 2 Full bathroom with deep soaking tub+ Half bath', '✪ W/D in unit', '✪Central AC', '✪Guarantors accepted', 'To schedule a viewing please feel free to Text/Call/Email', 'Always here to assist and help with anything..', 'Best,', 'Barak', 'Phone:917-485-2062']
